name: ItsMine
description:
Please read bugs below before playing, thank you :)

Horror for those who enjoy a short and “sweet” story. Escape by finding keys to locked doors as well as unlocking more of the story behind what happened. Themes that helped influence the design of the level were Isolation and horror. The level is a cabin consisting of two floors and a basement. 

Download the Uncompressed version below for some bug fixes.

ItsMine_Uncompressed0.1.zip

Bugs to mention:

1. Inability to put down notes. When reading a note, it has to be placed down where it was originally picked up.

2. Particle system was lost, so Dust particles were replaced with squares, fixed in the uncompressed version linked above.

3. Credits fail to load due to lost source location, fixed in the uncompressed version linked above. Hit any button to go back to main menu after final scene.

Hopefully all bugs will be fixed soon in the upcoming weeks, thank you and I appreciate all feedback :)
